Articles.Content:
Hello Ladies and Gents,

Brand new to KSP, played the demo for a couple of days and once I satisfied myself that I could at least conduct a semi-successful transfer to Mun, and with the added clincher of it being cheaper in the Steam Sale, I downloaded it to my Mac and here I am!

Just done a bit of playing around at the moment, done most of the tutorials (stuck on the Orbital Rendezvous one!) but thoroughly enjoying it all, looking forward to getting into more advanced stuff. How hard can it be? 

Thanks very much, look forward to learning what I can!

Matt.

Hello BrickTop and welcome to the forums!

There is a great deal of learning that happens while also getting massive amounts of fun.  Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

Hi Bricktop,

Welcome to the forum and the game. 

I am also at the start of my time playing Ksp full game as I bought it on steam as well, I have played the demo for a month but never got beyond orbiting at that point. 

Look forward to hearing more about your travels.

Rick
